 Apocalypse smiled as the girl left. He looked at
Magmatron. "I like the idea. We willl be able to train
our troops on combat that way. The only problem is I
think we are greatly outnumbered in most areas but im
sure our genius guiledart can build us something."
Guiledart stared sat him. "Okay simple reprograming
chamber not that hard," Apocalypse turned back to
Magmatron. "Im excited master."
--- t882hcc91@... wrote:
> NightBlade:
> 
>      She had heard his tactics. They seemed sound,
> but he still had 
> no target, he seemed to be a wandering fool, to her.
> "Excuse me?! You 
> don't know who you are going to attack? What?"
> 
> Magmatron:
> 
>      "Little one," he said, putting his hand on her
> back. "Do not 
> worry, we will have a target soon enough."
> 
> NightBlade:
> 
>      "Pfft!" She said, pushing his hand off, she did
> not notice the 
> small bug burroing into her exterior (what would you
> call the metal 
> outside of a Transformer in Robot Mode?). "Yea, I'm
> sure, if you do, 
> call me."
>      With that she walked out of the base and
> towards nowhere.
> 
> Magmatron:
> 
>      "Let her go," He said after she had left. "She
> might still come 
> in useful later."
>      His troops should know that he would have
> bugged her, but not 
> where or with what type of transmitter, basically
> because it was new.
>      "Shredder," Magmatron said. "Would you still
> have contacts 
> withing the Predacon ranks?"
>      A new plan had formed in his mind...
> 
>
